name: Markdown Editing - Section Reader
description: Reads a markdown file and, given a user prompt, selects and returns the most relevant section's title, content and hierarchy, along with the file path.
author: @@official.shinkai

prompt.description: A query or instruction indicating what kind of information or section the user is seeking in the markdown file

md_file_path.description: Filesystem path to the markdown (.md) file to parse and analyze
